Column.Name: Request
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, "Specify a request before submitting" )

Column.Name: Related Record Data
Vendor Access Enabled
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Vendor Access Enabled", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Enabled Vendor Actions
Column.Formula: COALESCE( [Enabled Vendor Actions], DB_LOOKUP( "Enabled Vendor Actions", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ) )

Column.Name: Vendor Action List
Enabled Contract Registers
Parent Structure

TextCriterion.Text: [IsSystem] <> TRUE

Binding.Expression: OR( AND( [Is System User] == TRUE, [Date Submitted] <> NULL() ), [Date Responded] <> NULL() )

"
"

Label.Text: Enter the details of the request for information
Submitting this Request for Information will trigger a notification to the Contract Manager.

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Label.Text: The date the request for information was submitted
The user who submitted this request
Enter the response details for this request

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Label.Text: Submitting this response will trigger a notification to the user who raised the request
The date the response to the request was submitted
The user who responded to this request

Binding.Expression: AND( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER() <> [Contract Manager], EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER() <> [SME Username]#[LineNumber], EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE(EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Administrators") <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Select the user to raise a communication record with

Column.Name: Last Message Sent by Display Name

Label.Text: Select the type of new record to be raised

Binding.Expression: AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Enabled Contract Registers], "Extensions") > 0, OR( [Is System User] = TRUE, ARRAY_INDEXOF([Vendor Action List], "Extensions") > 0 ) )
AND( [Navigation] = "Raise New Record", [Record to Raise] = "Request for Information" )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Enabled Contract Registers], "Variations") > 0, OR( [Is System User] = TRUE, ARRAY_INDEXOF([Vendor Action List], "Variations") > 0 ) )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Enabled Contract Registers], "Work Orders") > 0, OR( [Is System User] = TRUE, ARRAY_INDEXOF([Vendor Action List], "Work Order") > 0 ) )
AND( [Navigation] = "Raise New Record", [Record to Raise] = "Work Order" )
AND( [Navigation] = "Raise New Record", ARRAY_LENGTH([Related Record Data]) > 0 )

TextCriterion.Text: ( STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) ) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID]
) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
-- allow originator access if Contract RecordID has not been populated WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
--Check if user is in allocated role or department on parent Contract WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
--check if the user is the recipient of a communication record related to this request WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Communication] ON CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Recipient] GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
-- Check if user is listed in role on parent record WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
( STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) ) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID]
) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
( STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) ) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID]
) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
( STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) ) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID]
) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
( STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) ) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID]
) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
( STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) ) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID]
) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(1)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers'
( STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) ) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID]
) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Request for Information' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID]
) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
